## Custom Plugin

### Markdown Preview

- please Run code 

```bash
cd ~/.local/share/nvim/site/pack/packer/start/
git clone https://github.com/iamcco/markdown-preview.nvim.git
cd markdown-preview.nvim
yarn install
yarn build
```
